transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello? Good afternoon Vinod ji, Armaan baat kar raha hu head office IndiaMART se. 

Customer: Haan ji.

Executive: Kal baat hui thi na Vinod bhai, discussion karna tha mujhe service ke regarding aur kuch inputs bhi share karne the aapke. Aur rating reviews ke regarding.

Customer: To kal to baat nahi ho payi thi, aapne time diya tha but aap receive nahi kiya.

Executive: Nahi nahi receive bilkul nahi ho paya.

Customer: Haan bataiye. Meeting matlab kya system pe?

Executive: Haan ji, ye mobile phone se zoom kar lijiye.

Customer: Mobile phone se to nahi ho payega, kyuki abhi mai kar raha hu drive.

Executive: To kab tak connect kar payenge?

Customer: Sir matlab kal, kal kya ho raha hai kal, kal Saturday Sunday hai, kal to off rahega.

Customer: Haan kal Saturday hai na to thoda kal hi phone mil jata fir kal ke time matlab 12:01 baje ke aas paas mai aap free rahunga.

Executive: Sir kal off rahega.

Customer: Haan ji, to fir to yaar Monday ko karna padega kyuki abhi mai drive kar raha hu aur pata nahi matlab ye abhi kab tak chalega. Maine aapse isliye bhi pucha tha maine isliye kyuki kuch rating reviews pe mujhe discussion karna tha ki jab bhi aap buyer ke saath deal vagera close hua ki nahi Vinod bhai apna?

Executive: Haan haan.

Customer: To ask for review karna hai jisse genuinely client jo satisfied rahega unka hi feedback aapko milega.

Customer: Nahi jaise abhi maine review vagera ka mujhe to pehle pata bhi nahi tha ki aise matlab reviews ka bhi wo use hota hai to maine reviews to matlab unhone khud ne diya to mai uske baad me mere profile pe show ho gaya ek matlab three star bata raha to mai kya yaar ye ab show kar raha hai isme to usse pehle to aaj tak pehle matlab zero se jab aapki to tabhi fir aap jitne bhi jitne bhi client ke saath apne wo ho rahe hai na baat chit vagera jitne bhi agar apne ho rahe hai kya naam hai ye jitne bhi logo se contact ho rahe hai mai to sabko hi ask for review wala wo dal raha hu usme.

Executive: Sabhi ko nahi karna, wahi genuine feedback kaise milega fir aap bataye. Aise nahi karna sir mai batata hu jab aapki buyer ke saath deal close hogi aur client satisfied hoga properly tab aapko feedback tab aapko genuinely feedback dene lena hai jisse aapka buyer ka trust build ho.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Samajh rahe hai aap? Haan. Haan haan.

Customer: Nahi jinse jin logo se abhi kya naam hai WhatsApp vagera pe baat hoti hai uske baad me jo logo ne kharid liya hai vagera unse to mai mang hi liya matlab unse to bhej hi diya to maine WhatsApp pe bhi likh ke bhej diya ki aap review de dena matlab.

Executive: Nahi review isliye nahi aap matlab review to deal close hone ke baad liya jayega na.

Customer: Haan deal close hone ke baad to bol raha hu kyuki isme pehle bhi bahut logo se mere ko to review ka abhi pata laga ki review se aise matter karta hai kyuki maine vermi compost ka search kiya Rajasthan me to show hi nahi kar raha mere. Haan ji. V R N vermi compost to show hi nahi kar raha mai kya yaar ye kya hai fir ye to kaam ka bhi nahi to fir matlab kya raha. Aapne kaha tha top pe show hoga ye aapka top pe show hoga top pe show hi nahi ho raha usme usme maine nahi usme maine sare log dekhe. Haan. Usme maine sara check kiya aur aisa hai ki niche tak mai scroll karta gaya karta gaya lekin V R N vermi compost karke naam hi nahi tha. Fir maine specific location dali ki is location ke andar jaise Jodhpur hai to Jodhpur specific location dali tab jaake show kar raha hai.

Executive: To aapne cities to select karna padega na waha pe.

Customer: Nahi nahi select to karna hai lekin Rajasthan kya ye ye Jodhpur aata to Rajasthan ke andar hi hai na.

Executive: Haan ji.

Customer: To iska show to karna chahiye na ki ye jo Rajasthan me ye bhi hai.

Executive: Bilkul.

Customer: To usme maine ye apna apni Jodhpur Private Limited uska search kiya maine uska maine vermi compost me bhi search karke dekha usme bhi dekha usme apna search ke andar show hi nahi kar raha mai niche tak scroll kiya sari dusri baki sari dekhi. Show kar raha hai lekin apna to aa hi nahi raha tha tabhi tabhi fir maine review wala ye har kisi ko bheja maine kaha reviews se upar aata hai to reviews lete hai apan kya kyuki apni bahut sari deals hui hai unse agar review yahi aapka concern raise hua mere paas ki aapne is tarike se multiple us tarike se na sabse hi review mang raha tha to mai aapko batana chah raha hu ki aapko genuinely feedback lena hai uske regarding.

Customer: Nahi genuine dekho abhi jin ke saath baat chit ho gaye jinhone kharid liya hai unse to fir apan kar hi sakte hai na.

Executive: Haan haan bilkul unse to lenge hi definitely lenge unke saath. Haan to unko hi bheja hai abhi tak maine unko hi bheja hai jyadatar to baki to koi ek aadha kisi ko maine bhej diya hoga baki aisa maine kisi ko jo apne kisi ne kharida hai ye jaise. Haan. Ye aapki profile pe show karta hai waha pe jab aap reviews me jaate hai. Haan to to wahi to usme to wahi kaam ka hai na to wo cheez. Haan wahi cheez kaam ki hai jo aapka buyer ka trust build karega.

Customer: Kyuki apna show hi nahi kar raha Rajasthan me kisi ne search kiya to tabhi to usko. Sir ye wo mai aapko showcase kara dunga dobara se kya cheeze jo bhi concern hai aapka wo mai ek baar video meet one to one jo bhi concern rahega wo mai aapko showcase kara dunga. Samajh rahe hai na Vinod bhai? Abhi baki dekho enquiry jo aa rahi hai dekho suno suno enquiry jo aa rahi hai wo jyadatar to sari wo convert ho rahi hai.

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Lagbhag 90% jo enquiries aayi hai wo sari convert ho rahi hai to wo bhale hi matlab agar kam bhi leke gaye lekin leke gaye hai yaha se. Hmm matlab enquiries wo to aisa hai to samne se mai Balaji mandir hai. Kya keh rahe ho? Mai puch raha hu enquiry usi ki baat kar rahe hai na jinhone samne se aapko message dala tha lead manager pe. Haan haan unhone waha se jyadatar wo log matlab aake yaha se le jaate hai to unse to kaafi aise log to kaafi hai kyuki jo leke bhi gaye IndiaMART se to unse to abhi matlab jaise chat ke andar unke hai to unse review lene me kya dikkat hai?

Customer: Haan bilkul. Jo aapko le rahe hai na aapki profile pe unhi ka dikhna chahiye matlab ye hai genuine feedback aayega to aapka buyer ka trust build hoga waha pe.

Executive: Wahi to genuine feedback hi to hai kyuki apne dekho feedback aaj tak to liya nahi tha to itne sari deals hui hai to wo kaam kya hai matlab show kaise kare kyuki apni profile hi show nahi ho rahi hai to fir matlab kya fir.

Customer: Hamari wali profile show kar rahi hai?

Customer: Aapko kaha kar rahi hai Vinod Noval Private Limited aap search karke Rajasthan ke andar dalo. Aapko andar show kar jaye to bata dena usme. Haan mai abhi batata hu ek minute dijiye zara. Kyuki kyuki aisa hai ki apne promotion bhi karwaya hai iska theek hai promotion karane ke baad me kaafi idhar se matlab aise local to bahut sare log leke gaye hai lekin baki logo baki logo ne jaise Amazon aur ye kya naam hai IndiaMART pe search kiya to wo keh rahe hai ki aapka vermi compost search kar rahe hai Rajasthan ke andar aapko wo show hi nahi kar raha. To mai keh raha hu aap Jodhpur dalo fir. To uske Jodhpur me show kar raha hai mai keh raha hu Jodhpur Jodhpur ke log to kitne log aayenge IndiaMART se. Apne ko to all over India ka karna hai to fir Jodhpur Jodhpur karke bhi kya karenge Rajasthan me nahi aa raha to.

Executive: Bilkul usi pe to discuss karne wala tha aaj ki date me aap maine Vinod bhai kal bhi isliye call kiya to literally bata raha hu honestly bata raha hu isi ke liye maine call kiya tha ki aapka Jodhpur me to bahut competition hai iska.

Executive: Aur ek minute kyuki Jodhpur ka mere ko tension nahi hai kyuki Jodhpur me apne aise jaan pehchan ke log hai jo matlab aate rehte hai shop vagera jitni aap dekhenge to aa to rahe hai Vinod bhai Jodhpur ke supplier ke andar aap. Haan Jodhpur me aa Rajasthan ke andar. Sir Jodhpur Rajasthan ke andar hi to aata hai na. Jodhpur Rajasthan ke andar aata hai lekin kisi ne Rajasthan hi search kiya aas paas me agar nearby usne bhai Rajasthan ka state lagaya. Agar mai specific location chahu sirf apni location ke aas paas wo search karega usme to wo aayenge lekin jaise Rajasthan search kiya kisi ne to uske andar bhi show hona chahiye apni profile.

Executive: Nahi wo to mai aapko mujhe batana padega listing kaise kaam karti hai mai isliye kal bhi. Wahi to listing ka abhi listing ka agar rating se fark padta hai to rating to abhi mere bahut sare clients hai rating se lo aap bhi mobile pe. Nahi nahi sir listing rating to is cheez se kya hai? Haan? Ye city ye state hai aapka. City wise nikalna padega. Kya kehna hai fir? Agar aapko Rajasthan Rajasthan dekhna hai to aapko check karna padega city wise. Noida, Agra, Rohtak, Meerut, Bahraich, Jaipur, Delhi city wise chalta hai na ye to. Nahi nahi city wise to aap city daloge tab aap search karo vermi compost in Rajasthan. Koi bhi search karega to. Wo to near by location to near by location alag aayegi unki. Sir near by fir aapko na city wise dekhna padega ya to pan India level pe dekhiye ya fir us city wise dekhiye. Pan India me to bilkul hi show nahi kar raha Rajasthan me to Rajasthan me bhi show nahi kar raha baki Jodhpur me specific location daloge to Jodhpur to Jodhpur ke andar aap daloge tabhi show kar raha hai to Vinod bhai hame kitna time hua hai ji? Kaafi time ho gaya is cheez ko. Right. I think ek mahina ek mahine se upar ho chuka hai na? Ek nahi teen ho gaye ek kaise ho jayega? Ek mahina thodi hua hai. Haan? Check karo kab check karo last kab diya tha start kab kiya hua hai. September me I think September ka hai. To kitna mahine ho gaye? September October November chal raha hai matlab two months complete ho gaya iska. Haan to wahi hai na teesra to chal hi raha. Theek hai dekho iska hum tabhi fir ya to fir dekho iska apan one by one aap batao ki sir iska dekh ke puch ke proper batana ki listing aur ye ratings kya ratings ka bhi chahiye kyuki profile pe ratings bilkul show nahi kar rahi to ratings vagera ka bhi karna padega to aap mere ko ek baar Monday agar aap kal chutti hai to fir Monday ko karte hai theek hai? Theek hai otherwise kal agar mere ko time milta hai to mai ek baar dekhta hu kal time batao. Haan kal time mile to kal 12:01 baje ke aas paas kar lenge. Theek hai. Otherwise mai Monday ko aapko update kar hi raha hu. Baki ek concern raise hua tha jo aapne maine aapko bataya ki wo aapko feedback ask for review karna hai. Hello? Hmm. Haan haan Vinod bhai jab bhi koi deal close hogi na ek ask for review ka option aata hai wo aap buyer ko share karenge waha se wo feedback de dega wo profile pe aapka dikhega fir. Theek hai. Theek hai. Ab ek concern tha jo aapka yaha pe raise hua hai ye isi ke regarding to mai aapke paas ek feedback jayega to abhi ye concern close karu sir? Haan haan kar do kar do. Ek feedback jayega jo meri email id pe. To please theek hai aapko theek hai baki koi bhi update rahega aap definitely message ya call karenge mai aapko connect kar dunga. Theek hai Vinod bhai? Baki understanding kara dunga ek baar kaise kaam karti hai listing vagera dobara. Theek hai chaliye. Thank you.
summary:
\n
Concerns:\n
- Profile not showing in Rajasthan search.
- Ratings not showing on profile.
- Asking for reviews from every client.\n
\n
Resolution:\n
- Executive explained how to ask for reviews.
- Executive will showcase listing process again.\n
\n
Next Steps: \n
- Executive will connect on Monday.\n
\n
Alert (If Any):\n
None\n
@@@Sentiment:\n
- Angry -> Satisfied\n
\n
@@@Key Topics:\n
- profile, listing, reviews, vermicompost\n
\n
